<template>
    <Teleport v-if="mounted" to="#app-bar-actions">
        <v-btn @click="beenden" >Beenden</v-btn>
    </Teleport>
</template>
<script>
    export default {
        data() {
            return {
                mounted: false
            }
        },
        methods:{
            beenden() {
                window.close();

                this.send({
                payload: ""
                });
            },
        },
        mounted() {
            this.mounted = true
        }
    }
</script>
